scripts.translate: npm run translate:pot && npm run translate:update && npm run translate:compile
scripts.translate:update: for file in ./languages/*.po; do vendor/bin/wp i18n update-po ./languages/webkinder-sproutset.pot $file; done
scripts.translate:check: find ./languages -name "*.po" | while read pofile; do mofile="${pofile%.po}.mo"; if [ ! -f "$mofile" ] || [ "$pofile" -nt "$mofile" ]; then echo "$pofile needs compilation"; fi; done
